title: BRIEF-Mitel Networks reports Qtrly ‍Non-GAAP EPS From Continuing Operations $ 0.27​
text: 42 AM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Mitel Networks reports Qtrly ‍Non-GAAP EPS From Continuing Operations $ 0.27​ Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Mitel Networks Corp: * MITEL REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER RESULTS * QTRLY ‍NON-GAAP EPS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $ 0.27​ * QTRLY ‍GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS (BASIC) $0.01 ​ * SEES ‍Q1 NON-GAAP REVENUES $300 MILLION TO $320 MILLION​ * ‍QTRLY GAAP REVENUES FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS $355.9 MILLION VERSUS $259.8 MILLION IN Q4 2016 ​ * SEES Q1 ‍NON-GAAP EPS $0.07 TO $0.13​ * ‍SEES Q1 NON-GAAP GROSS MARGIN 55.2% TO 57.2%​ * Q4 REVENUE VIEW $346.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
